channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dead & Company to Celebrate Grateful Dead’s 60th Anniversary With San Francisco Concerts
item.description: 🌟 Let's dance the night away! Dead & Company is bringing the party to San Francisco for the Grateful Dead's 60th anniversary! 🎉 #DeadAndCo #GratefulDead #MusicMagic

item.title: Burna Boy Reveals Release Date for New Album, Shares New Song Featuring Travis Scott: Listen
item.description: 🔥🎶 Get ready to vibe! Burna Boy drops album release date and a collab with Travis Scott! Press play now! #BurnaBoy #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Former Girlpool Member Avery Tucker Shares Debut Solo Single “Big Drops”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy vibes with Avery Tucker's solo debut "Big Drops"! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert #SoloArtistJourney

item.title: Grinderman to Reissue Albums on Vinyl and CD
item.description: Get ready to spin those Grinderman grooves! 🎶 Vinyl and CD reissues coming your way soon! 🔥 #Grinderman #MusicNews

item.title: SZA Looking After Fans By Gifting Tickets, Confiscating Whippets
item.description: SZA spreading love with ticket surprises and keeping concerts whippet-free! 🎫🚫 #SZA #MusicNews
